params.name: options
params.doc: Options to use when deleting a marketing tag.

docs.summary:
Deletes a marketing tag.
> __Note__: This function is restricted and only runs if you elevate permissions using the [wix-auth.elevate()](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-auth/elevate) function.

params.name: options
params.doc: Information about the marketing tags to retrieve.

docs.summary:
Retrieves marketing tags given the provided filter.
> __Note__: This function is restricted and only runs if you elevate permissions using the [wix-auth.elevate()](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-auth/elevate) function.

params.name: tag
params.doc: Marketing tag to create or update.

docs.summary:
Creates or updates a marketing tag.
> __Note__: This function is restricted and only runs if you elevate permissions using the [wix-auth.elevate()](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-auth/elevate) function.

members.name: type
members.doc: Information about the marketing tag to delete.

members.name: type
members.doc: Marketing tag to delete. Supported values: `"GOOGLE_ADS"`, `"GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"`, `"YANDEX_METRICA"`, `"FACEBOOK_PIXEL"`, `"GOOGLE_TAG_MANAGER"`.

members.name: tagType
members.doc: Marketing tag to delete. Supported values: `"GOOGLE_ADS"`, `"GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"`, `"YANDEX_METRICA"`, `"FACEBOOK_PIXEL"`, `"GOOGLE_TAG_MANAGER"`.

members.name: tagType
members.doc: Marketing tag to delete. Supported values: `"GOOGLE_ADS"`, `"GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"`, `"YANDEX_METRICA"`, `"FACEBOOK_PIXEL"`, `"GOOGLE_TAG_MANAGER"`.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain associated with the Facebook Pixel tag.

members.name: trackingId
members.doc:
Pixel ID in 123456789 format.
Specifies which Facebook Pixel is associated with the site owner.

members.name: byType
members.doc: Filter by tag type. Supported values: `"GOOGLE_ADS"`, `"GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"`, `"YANDEX_METRICA"`, `"FACEBOOK_PIXEL"`, `"GOOGLE_TAG_MANAGER"`.

description: Information about which marketing tags to retrieve.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain associated with the Google Ads Conversion tag.

members.name: trackingId
members.doc:
Conversion ID in AW-123456789 format.
Specifies which Google property is associated with the site owner.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain associated with the Google Analytics tag.

members.name: ipAnonymization
members.doc: Whether IP addresses of site visitors are hidden from Google.

members.name: trackingId
members.doc:
Measurement ID for Google Analytics 4 tags in G-12345 format,
or Analytics ID for Google Universal Analytics tags in UA-12345-1 format.
Specifies which Google property is associated with the site owner.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain associated with the Google tag.

members.name: trackingId
members.doc:
Tag Manager Container ID in GTM-12345 format.
Specifies which Google Tag Manager Container is associated with the site owner.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Information about which tags to retrieve.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Information about which tags to retrieve.

members.name: tags
members.doc: List of marketing tags.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Marketing tag ID.

members.name: enabled
members.doc:
Whether this tag is enabled.
Defaults to `true`.

members.name: facebookPixel
members.doc:
A [Facebook Pixel tag](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/facebook-pixel/)
allows site owners to track Facebook ad-driven visitor activity on their site.

members.name: googleAds
members.doc:
A [Google Ads Conversion tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6105160?hl=en&ref_topic=6334091)
lets site owners analyze what a visitor does after clicking on a Google ad.

members.name: googleAnalytics
members.doc:
A [Google Analytics tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/topic/6333310?hl=en&ref_topic=3002579)
lets site owners track page views, where visitors are coming from, how long they stay, and
what keywords they used to find the site. Both [Google Universal Analytics Tags](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6107124?hl=en&ref_topic=6333310)
and [Google Analytics 4 tags](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/9442095?hl=en&ref_topic=6333310)
are supported.

members.name: googleTagManager
members.doc:
A [Google tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6102821?hl=en&ref_topic=3441530)
lets site owners implement a quick and easy tag management system that keeps
3rd party code snippets organized.

members.name: type
members.doc: Marketing tag type. Supported values: `"GOOGLE_ADS"`, `"GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"`, `"YANDEX_METRICA"`, `"FACEBOOK_PIXEL"`, `"GOOGLE_TAG_MANAGER"`.

members.name: yandexMetrica
members.doc:
A [Yandex Metrica tag](https://yandex.com/support/metrica/index.html) lets site
owners build visual reports of visitor activity that helps them evaluate the
performance of their marketing campaigns.

members.name: facebookPixel
members.doc:
A [Facebook Pixel tag](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/facebook-pixel/)
allows site owners to track Facebook ad-driven visitor activity on their site.

members.name: googleAds
members.doc:
A [Google Ads Conversion tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6105160?hl=en&ref_topic=6334091)
lets site owners analyze what a visitor does after clicking on a Google ad.

members.name: googleAnalytics
members.doc:
A [Google Analytics tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/topic/6333310?hl=en&ref_topic=3002579)
lets site owners track page views, where visitors are coming from, how long they stay, and
what keywords they used to find the site. Both [Google Universal Analytics Tags](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6107124?hl=en&ref_topic=6333310)
and [Google Analytics 4 tags](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/9442095?hl=en&ref_topic=6333310)
are supported.

members.name: googleTagManager
members.doc:
A [Google tag](https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/6102821?hl=en&ref_topic=3441530)
lets site owners implement a quick and easy tag management system that keeps
3rd party code snippets organized.

members.name: yandexMetrica
members.doc:
A [Yandex Metrica tag](https://yandex.com/support/metrica/index.html) lets site
owners build visual reports of visitor activity that helps them evaluate the
performance of their marketing campaigns.

members.name: tag
members.doc: Marketing tag to create or update.

members.name: tag
members.doc: Created or updated marketing tag.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain associated with the Yandex Metrica tag.

members.name: trackingId
members.doc:
Yandex Tag Number in 123456789 format.
Specifies which Yandex tag is associated with the site owner.
